title: Why do we have to log in twice to post on the boards?
body:
Title.
I was already logged in, posting on the regular forums and then i come over to this new boards thing, it shows im still logged in and bammo, when i go to post is asks me to login again.
The NA one never had that problem...

replies.body: also, the upvote and downvote arrows dont seem to be working from the boards/all section. or atleast they arent dynamic and dont change when i click them.

Ok, so it seems i can only post into this thread, for the reason "you must be level 10 or higher to post here" showing up on just about every other thread...
bugs plz.
Hi, what browser and operating system are you using?
